title: Bodice, late 19th–early 20th century
medium:
Medium: piña fiber, cotton
Technique: appliqué and embroidery on plain weave
description: Simple bodice, front and back in one piece, with a round, low neck. Very sheer, off-white piña cloth with an appliqué design of small flowers outlined in white embroidery. Border around the neck of a vine and flower design in the same technique.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bodice, late 19th–early 20th century.Medium: piña fiber, cotton
Technique: appliqué and embroidery on plain weave. 1949-47-1.
